entities.name: mr crouch
entities.description: Mr. Crouch is described as looking utterly mad, with rolling and bulging eyes, and a trickle of spittle sliding down his chin. He is struggling to speak.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is introduced as a student at the school who tries to help Mr. Crouch get up and go see Dumbledore.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as someone that Mr. Crouch wants to tell something to.

relationships.description: Harry tries to help Mr. Crouch get up and go see Dumbledore.
Mr. Crouch wants to tell something to Dumbledore.
Harry looks around for help from Krum, but Krum is hanging back and looking extremely nervous.
Mr. Crouch wants to go see Dumbledore.
